title: How to get a display on an LCD screen before installing Windows on a laptop because my laptop screen is broken - Quora

response.answer_text: Two ways: Fix the screen. You are probably going to have to do this sooner or later anyway. Plug in a desktop monitor via HDMI or other video out (almost all laptops have a port) and use whatever function key combo your model requires to switch to external display. Some models will do this automatically.
Or…hook the screen up to VGA or whatever port you have. Plug in external mouse and keyboard and the WIndows drive. As soon as you power on close the lid. It will switch to the external screen.
